articles.description: Commentary from global peers has continued to be reassuring on client spending all through despite increasing macro volatility and associated investor and street concerns going by prior cycles. According to analysts, demand is holding up well for Indian techs…

articles.author: Nishikant Karlikar
articles.title: Thane: Kin of music composer, 1 other let off in drug case
articles.description: The Thane sessions court on Friday acquitted the granddaughter of a veteran music composer and one other person who were arrested for alleged mephedrone possession in 2015. Sessions judge H M Patwardhan, after hearing both sides, said the prosecution had fail…

articles.author: Mohua Chatterjee
articles.title: Hasina's 3-day India trip likely from September 6
articles.description: India News: DHAKA: Bangladesh premier Sheikh Hasina is likely to visit India from September 6 to 8 this year, reports Mohua Chatterjee.

articles.author: Richa Pinto
articles.title: Mumbai to face 10% water cut from Monday: BMC
articles.description: Starting Monday, Mumbaikars will face a 10% water cut, the BMC announced on Friday. The decision was taken owing to inadequate rainfall over the catchment area lakes this month and existing water stocks in the seven lakes that cater to Mumbai's drinking water…

articles.title: From April, India plans its own car crash-test ratings

articles.title: '75 concerned citizens' write to K'taka CM Basavaraj Bommai

articles.author: Sachin Parashar
articles.title: Don't politicise 'designation of terrorists', Modi tells Brics
articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: PM Narendra Modi called upon Brics member-states in the just concluded summit to show understanding of the security concerns of each other .

articles.author: Prafulla Marpakwar
articles.title: Maha: MVA Govt issues 280 GRs in four days, will need Rs 1,600 cr
articles.description: Notwithstanding the political instability in the state following the revolt by Shiv Sena's Eknath Shinde on Tuesday, the MVA government led by CM Uddhav Thackeray has taken 280 decisions since Monday.

articles.author: Priyanka Kakodkar,Ranjan Dasgupta
articles.title: Maha political crisis: Sena camps dig in heels as tussle gets technical
articles.description: The coup within the Shiv Sena, which has left the MVA government teetering, stretched on with both sides digging in their heels on Friday.
